issue.title: duration streaming precondition should be a SFINAE condition

blockquote.p: Requires: Rep is an integral type whose integer conversion rank () is greater than or equal to that of short, or a floating point type. charT is char or wchar_t.

discussion.p: I think the intention was to make this a compile-time error, since all the information to make it so is available at compile-time. But the wording doesn't suggest that.
The wording will be significantly simplified by the application of the new Library element Constraints: introduced by P0788R3 and available with the post-Rapperswil working draft.
discussion.note: 2018-07-20 Priority set to 2 after reflector discussion. NAD and P0 were also mentioned.
